title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS Universal Mann ProVent 16mm Oil Catch Can Kit for Crank Case 16mm (5/8″) Outlet OS-PROV-04-16mm

content.rendered:
Universal Mann ProVent 16mm Oil Catch Can Kit
This ProVent 200 kit is Universal and will suit any vehicle that has an outlet from the engine that measures 16mm O.D or 5/8″ ! The unit fits inline between hose from the top of the crankcase back to the air intake, removing oily sludge and condensation – saving your intercooler & turbo from blocking up ! The filter element is usually changed at about 40,000kms intervals. (Some engines more, some engines less !)

Advantages of MANN+HUMMEL ProVent catch cans as opposed to cheaper ripoffs:
Highly efficient oil separation providing ideal protection for the turbocharger and other components installed downstream

• Less motor oil consumption in comparison to less
efficient separators or conventional open systems
• Maintenance friendly: fittings are not removed
during element maintenance
• Universal usage: exceptional for variable flow rates
• Integrated safety feature against irregularly high
crankcase pressure
• Light and robust design • No electrical energy required
• Compact design • Low pressure loss • Low running costs
Provent Kit Includes:
:: Provent Unit & Hoses
:: 16mm x 4m Hose
:: Drain Kit
:: Install Guide
